metadata.title: CVE-2020-35730 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
An XSS issue was discovered in Roundcube Webmail before 1.2.13, 1.3.xbefore 1.3.16, and 1.4.x before 1.4.10. The attacker can send a plain texte-mail message, with JavaScript in a link reference element that ismishandled by linkref_addindex in rcube_string_replacer.php.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-35730` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

roundcube - 1.4.10+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-core - 1.4.10+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-mysql - 1.4.10+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-pgsql - 1.4.10+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-plugins - 1.4.10+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-sqlite3 - 1.4.10+dfsg.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: roundcube package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.10+dfsg.1-1').
